fullText: Playwright Kristoffer Diaz, director Michael Greif and choreographer Camille A. Brown have found the right recipe for this show—and, in its vivid dancers and magnificent singers, just the right ingredients—and they've cooked up a heck of a block party.
dtliExcerpt: Playwright Kristoffer Diaz, director Michael Greif and choreographer Camille A. Brown have found the right recipe for this show—and, in its vivid dancers and magnificent singers, just the right ingredients—and they've cooked up a heck of a block party.
showScoreExcerpt: "Hell’s Kitchen is ultimately a celebration of the city—and the people who make it pop."

keyPhrases.quote: found the right recipe for this show
cooked up a heck of a block party
